name: Nortinium
description:
The game


Nortinium is a puzzle platformer designed using pixel art graphics, for those who love a challenge as well as a bit of gaming nostalgia.
The game follows the adventures of Arthur Shadowstrike, as he navigates eight unique biomes within the realm of Nortinium, to retrieve the eight "Rings of Destiny" that were previously lost to history, and are believed to bring harmony and good fortune to the beholder.

Join Arthur on his quest through different environments whilst using wit and strength to avoid perilous obstacles, take down enemies and collect the rings and other treasures along the way!

Current Development Stage

Demo


Feel free to give the game a try with our playable demo, which demonstrates some of the key features of the game and puts your skills to the test (try not to rage quit)!

Join our community

Why not join your fellow warriors on the official Discord server, where you can join in the fun and games, share your best level times and experiences, join in beta testing and bug hunting (see if you can break the game?!), interact with the Korebolt team and help shape the development of the game.

Sharing the love

For every copy of the game sold, on every platform, we will donate £1 to local, national and global charities - including those that teach children to code, the WWF and Cancer Research UK, to name a few. By supporting our game, you'll also be supporting the work of some fantastic causes and doing your bit while having fun at the same time.
